entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 19 except 12 near Lake Ontario.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High 19 except 12 near Lake Ontario. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 7.
